title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: When saving and previewing the report, the filter should work without any errors. However, the actual result is that there are errors on the report page. The error message states: 'There are error(s) in Table: table8. Error 0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s)). Detail: An error happened in data type conversion. Can not convert it to Date. Can not convert it to Date.'
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 

1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column. 
2. Insert a table into the report. 
3. Create a new filter based on the datetime column. 
4. In the value field of the filter, input the value new Date('...'). For example, new Date('3/2/2005').
